name: Gmail 2018 Rebirth
description: So Gmail launches the new interface, decides that huge round buttons are the way forward, and other layout tweaks that simply do not do it justice. So i created a new tweak to the current new layout which is much more pleasing to the eye. This theme is friendly with or without backgrounds, both dark and light themes. Enjoy!

user.name: Mitchm
user.about: Web Designer, Internet Denizen.....Hello, nice to meet you

additional_info:
Any bugs let me know about them...

v1.7 - Small fix Gmail introduced something that caused the new compose orb to be off centre, this will fix that
v1.6 - Some minor fixes due to changes by Google (specifically a weird hover over effect), Added some transparency to the hover over effect on email list
v1.5 - Some minor fixes due to changes by Google
v1.4 - Added a bit more height on email left column list to space out a bit better, removed Hover over effect from the Checkbox and also the Star
v1.3 - Added some padding to the top of the page when reading emails, also reduced fonts of title for emails
v1.2 - Added margin to the top of the page when reading emails to show a true page look when viewing the email
v1.1 - Major update - Removed lot of seperator elements that i believe makes interface look more clean, added rounded page border elements with inset shadow and various other small tweaks.
v1.0 - Initial release

Note: If you want to add full transparency to the left email list menu check code and modify as needed on the line commented regarding transparency
